# coordinate

**Instance Property**

A 2D coordinate that corresponds to the latitude and longitude of the specified map point.

## Declaration

```swift
var coordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D { get }
```

## Getting the point coordinates

- **x**: The location of the point along the x-axis of the map.
- **y**: The location of the point along the y-axis of the map.

items.description: The location of the point along the x-axis of the map.
